desc: Jewelry making classes, supplies and gemstones. Edmonton's best selection of healing stones and rock specimens of all types. We sell lapidary supplies, beading supplies and silversmithing supplies.

layout.text: ALBERTA'S LARGEST ROCK and GEM SHOP

Jewelry, Beads and Jewelry Making Tools
Beautiful and fascinating specimens from around the world. All of them ethically sourced. 
Be prepared to spend some time here with us!
